about_the_game:
Bundle Cupid : unlocks 7 new in-game cosmetics 3 hats 3 visors & 1 nameplate

- (Hat) Cupid
- (Hat) I Love You (color adaptative)
- (Hat) Timid (color adaptative)
- (Viusor) Baloon
- (Visor) In Love
- (Visor) You and Me (2 Player skin)
- (Nameplate) Love & Cupid !

"This mod is not affiliated with Among Us or Innersloth LLC, and the content contained therein is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Innersloth LLC. Portions of the materials contained herein are property of Innersloth LLC. © Innersloth LLC."

name: AmongUS Challenger - Cupid Bundle (2023)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / Ryzen 3 / or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / Ryzen 3 / or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
